item.title: Krishana Phoschem Q3 FY26: Stellar Growth Momentum Continues with 62% Profit Surge
item.description: Krishana Phoschem Limited, a Rajasthan-based fertiliser and specialty chemicals manufacturer, has delivered an exceptional third quarter performance for FY2026, reporting a net profit of ₹33.32 crores—a remarkable 62.29% year-on-year surge from ₹20.53 crores in Q3 FY25. The company's stock, currently trading at ₹494.85 with a market capitalisation of ₹2,979 crores, has demonstrated extraordinary momentum over the past year with returns of 160.42%, significantly outperforming the Sensex's 8.21% gain by a staggering 152 percentage points. Time: 4 hours ago

item.title: Raj Rayon Industries Ltd Hits Lower Circuit Amid Heavy Selling Pressure
item.description: Raj Rayon Industries Ltd, a small-cap player in the Garments & Apparels sector, witnessed a sharp decline on 12 Jan 2026 as it hit its lower circuit price limit, closing at ₹21.41. The stock faced intense selling pressure, resulting in a maximum daily loss of 1.97%, reflecting growing investor concerns amid deteriorating technical and fundamental indicators. Time: 5 hours ago

item.title: Blue Coast Hotels Ltd Hits Lower Circuit Amid Heavy Selling Pressure
item.description: Blue Coast Hotels Ltd, a micro-cap player in the Hotels & Resorts sector, witnessed intense selling pressure on 12 Jan 2026, hitting its lower circuit limit with a sharp 4.97% decline to close at ₹30.78. The stock’s performance starkly underperformed its sector and broader market benchmarks, reflecting mounting investor concerns and panic selling in a highly volatile trading session. Time: 5 hours ago

item.title: Winsome Yarns Ltd Hits Lower Circuit Amid Heavy Selling Pressure
item.description: Shares of Winsome Yarns Ltd, a micro-cap player in the Garments & Apparels sector, plunged to their lower circuit limit on 12 Jan 2026, reflecting intense selling pressure and panic among investors. The stock closed at ₹1.85, down 1.07% on the day, marking its maximum permissible daily loss and signalling heightened market anxiety around the company’s near-term prospects. Time: 5 hours ago

item.title: IDFC First Bank Sees Exceptional Volume Amid Mixed Price Action
item.description: IDFC First Bank Ltd. emerged as one of the most actively traded stocks on 12 Jan 2026, registering a total traded volume exceeding 2.13 crore shares. Despite this surge in activity, the stock closed marginally lower at ₹84.84, down 0.96% from the previous close, reflecting a complex interplay of investor sentiment and market dynamics within the private sector banking space. Time: 5 hours ago

item.title: BF Utilities Ltd Hits Lower Circuit Amid Heavy Selling Pressure
item.description: Shares of BF Utilities Ltd plunged to their lower circuit limit on 12 Jan 2026, succumbing to intense selling pressure that saw the stock lose 5.0% in a single session. The transport infrastructure company’s stock closed at ₹599.65, marking its lowest intraday price and triggering a trading halt due to the maximum permissible daily loss. Time: 5 hours ago

item.title: Indian Renewable Energy Development Agency Ltd Sees Sharp Open Interest Surge Amid Market Rebound
item.description: Indian Renewable Energy Development Agency Ltd (IREDA) witnessed a significant surge in open interest in its derivatives segment on 12 Jan 2026, signalling a potential shift in market positioning. The stock outperformed its sector peers and the broader Sensex, gaining 3.59% on the day, supported by a 10.46% rise in open interest and robust volume activity. This development has attracted investor attention amid a backdrop of mixed moving average signals and declining delivery volumes. Time: 5 hours ago

item.title: Delhivery Ltd Sees Sharp Open Interest Surge Amid Bearish Price Action
item.description: Delhivery Ltd, a key player in the transport services sector, has witnessed a notable surge in open interest in its derivatives segment, rising by 11.9% to 17,990 contracts. This increase comes amid a sustained decline in the stock price, which has fallen 7.7% over the past three trading sessions, signalling a complex interplay of market positioning and investor sentiment. Time: 5 hours ago

item.title: Bank of Maharashtra Sees Exceptional Volume Surge Amid Strong Buy Momentum
item.description: Bank of Maharashtra (MAHABANK) has emerged as one of the most actively traded stocks on 12 Jan 2026, registering a remarkable surge in volume and price momentum. The public sector bank’s shares witnessed a total traded volume exceeding 2.04 crore shares, accompanied by a notable price appreciation, signalling strong accumulation interest among investors. Time: 5 hours ago

item.title: Hitachi Energy India Sees Sharp Open Interest Surge Amid Bearish Price Action
item.description: Hitachi Energy India Ltd (POWERINDIA) has witnessed a significant 18.55% surge in open interest in its derivatives segment, signalling heightened market activity and shifting investor positioning. Despite this, the stock has underperformed its sector and the broader market, falling over 10% in the last three sessions, reflecting a complex interplay between rising speculative interest and bearish price momentum. Time: 5 hours ago

item.title: Laurus Labs Ltd Sees Sharp Open Interest Surge Amid Mixed Price Action
item.description: Laurus Labs Ltd, a key player in the Pharmaceuticals & Biotechnology sector, has witnessed a notable surge in open interest (OI) in its derivatives segment, signalling heightened market activity and shifting investor positioning. Despite a recent price decline, the stock’s derivatives market reveals increased speculative interest, suggesting potential directional bets as investors recalibrate amid sectoral and broader market dynamics. Time: 5 hours ago

item.title: Bharti Airtel Ltd Sees High-Value Trading Amid Mixed Technical Signals
item.description: Bharti Airtel Ltd, a heavyweight in the Telecom - Services sector, witnessed significant trading activity on 12 Jan 2026, with a total traded value exceeding ₹522 crores. Despite this robust turnover, the stock experienced a modest decline, reflecting a complex interplay of market forces and investor sentiment amid a four-day losing streak. Time: 5 hours ago
